notes: 1.5kg of plant ash is steeped in 5kg of millet wine and then the ash is filtered out to get the decoction, in which Bie Jia is decocted into a gum. All the other drugs are ground into fine powder. The gum and the powder are made with honey into pills. 3g of the pills are taken with warm boiled water each time, 3 times daily.
